```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df_games = pd.read_csv("../data/mxd_games.csv")
df_shots = pd.read_csv(
    "../data/mxd_shots.csv", 
    dtype={60: str, 64: str}
)
df_games.head()
```


```{python}
df_shots.head()
```

```{python}
coord_cols = df_shots.columns[df_shots.columns.str.match(r'^[RY][1-6][XY]$')]

games_cols = [
    "ID","Game","T1_Colour","T2_Colour",
    "T1","T2"
]
shot_cols = (
    ["ID","Game","End","Shot",
     "Throw","Percent","PowerPlay"] +
    list(coord_cols)

)

df= df_shots[shot_cols].merge(
    df_games[games_cols],
    on=["ID", "Game"],
    how="left"
)
```
